item.title: GitHub pages & custom domain name? Don't forget CNAME! `[SOLVED]`
item.description: The problem ❔ I am maintaning the website of the McCann Lab that is currently hosted on the GitHub Pages. Since I set up the custom domain, I was experiencing a weird issue: after every single deployment even on GitHub Pages (originally done by Travis, now by using a dedicated GitHub Actions workflow) the custom domain was removed and I had to rewrite it everytime (see ⬇) which was pretty annoying.

item.title: Deploy a pkgdown on gh-pages
item.description: There are three ways to deploy a website on your GitHub pages : using the gh-pages; using the folder docs on your master branch; using the master branch.
